name: Rockman's Universe
description:
ROCKMAN is RETIRING.

HE NEEDS to find a new APPRENTICE to help solve the problems of the UNIVERSE.

IT could be YOU.

YOU HAVE 10 SECONDS to solve each TINY PUZZLE.

LUCKILY they are pretty SIMPLE once you find the TRICK to them

Don't get too FRUSTRATED. It WILL happen!

-------------------------------------------------------------

**CLICK and DRAG to move the world around.**

**CLICK and DRAG and SCROLL to move an object in 3-D SPACE.**

**CLICK on something to TALK to it.**

**PRESS ESCAPE to PAUSE.**

**PRESS Q to QUIT because of FRUSTRATION.**

This is my first game, I'm very glad. It was done with maya, substance painter, and unity in about a month and a half. 

Thanks to Dave G. for programming help, Brendan R. for some other help and for his synthesizer and Matt U. for visual critique.  Also thanks to Vlaxim on freesound for the computer noises. Some small changes were made to fit them into the game. (https://freesound.org/people/Vlaxim/sounds/342955/)

BRENDAN R. has a game too and you can find it HERE

https://brendan-roarty.itch.io/tomato-taxi

HMU, LMK how you liked it or disliked it!

My INSTAGRAM is @james.cannizzaro

Thanks!
